data

Class SparseDataToDense

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.SparseDataToDenseTFRecord

  • public class SparseDataToDense
extends java.lang.Object
    Convert from a sparse representation of QWOP runs to a dense representation by re-simulating.

    There are several "densities" of QWOP game data saved. During giant searches, data is usually saved as [state, keys, wait time], and only at key changes is data held (i.e. at nodes). All the in-between states are discarded. For trajectory libraries, machine learning training, etc., we may want data which has the state at every timestep. Hence, we pick the important sparse data out of a tree, and pass it to this class. It will re-simulate these runs, log data at every timestep, and save this data in TFRecord form.

    Author:
    matt
